name: I'm Too Ace For This
description:
This game was made as a slight parody on the typical visual novels, as well as with the purpose to let the world know that aromantic people exist. Which is, of course, what aromantic awareness week is all about.

This is the first visual novel I created, and with less than a month between starting on it and my deadline, I decided to keep the story and art simple. It was also the first time I had to work with sound, which proved to be quite challenging.

But I enjoyed creating it, and I hope you enjoy the result too.
